Reviews.Title: “Why Choose Rose Garden, Bur Dubai?”
Reviews.Author: Gulam S
Reviews.Content: I have been making 2/3 trips to Dubai every year for the past 15 years. I normally am set on one hotel but they have not only increased their rates but there has been very little maintenance. I was looking for an alternative hotel and surfed the net. I selected the Rose Garden Bur Dubai and talked to the staff and the Manager, Mr Abdul Azeez. They made me comfortable for me to 'risk' making a move from my regular hotel. On my arrival, past midnight, I found the staff pretty alert and welcomed us with a smile and a fresh juice drink, There was some misunderstanding regarding the room. The Front Desk called the Manager (past midnight) to get the matter resolved. The Manager, Mr Abdul Azeez was very accommodating and a thorough gentlemen and the issue was resolved to the satisfaction of both parties. The staff were very helpful, polite and friendly during our stay. The rooms are cleaned daily and spotless. The Wi Fi router in each room was very essential and complimentary whereas in other hotels they would normally charge between Dhs 25-50 per day. The location is fantastic with Bur Juman Shopping Mall across the road, and Restaurants and Cafes and the metro within a few minutes walk. You cannot ask for a better location Overall the hotel exceeded our expectations and we intend to use the Rose Gardens Bur Dubai as our 'regular' hotel for future visits to Dubai We would highly recommend this hotel to all who read this review and further we will recommend it to our friends all over the world G M S London

Reviews.Title: “Book in advance and got a good price”
Reviews.Author: Siumee
Reviews.Content: We and our friends were upgraded from Studio to One Bedroom Apt. (Rm 307 & 404) which were very nice. Room 404 looked like newly furnished. But Room 307 was a bit dated, especially the bath tub. The apartments are very large and comfortable. Slippers and Hairdryers need to borrow from the counter. It took quite long to have them. WiFi is fast. But is only available in bedroom. Staff services are acceptable. Location of the hotel is very good. Very convenient to go to many attractions. It takes only a 10-15 min walk to the Creek. A Metro station is within 300 meters. Burjuman Mall is just a block away. If you want to take a taxi, go to the main entrance of Burjuman Mall where there are always a lot of taxis waiting. The bell boy took 20 min. to hire a taxi for us near the hotel when we went to the airport. We book 3 months in advance from the Hotels website and got a very good price. It can be booked with any currency, but remember to pay in AED. Their exchange rate spread is very high.

Reviews.Title: “Good option for family travellers”
Reviews.Author: MariaS829
Reviews.Content: Nice and friendly staff, great, quiet location. Just like at Grand Midwest two years ago we got a big, clean apartment with two bedrooms, two bathrooms, living room and kitchen. The roof top pool was great entertainment for the kids in the mornings (and the gym for their mum) so we often ended up doing both breakfast and lunch in the apartment before exploring the rest of family friendly Dubai. The BurJuman shopping mall seems to have lost some customers to Dubai Mall etc. but is still OK for late dinner.

Reviews.Title: “great location, large rooms”
Reviews.Author: praha13
Reviews.Content: The Rose Garden Hotel is well located, close to the older part of town and near a metro stop. Our apartment was extremely large and the place was clean and quiet. The staff was very pleasant. There is a nice pool on the top floor. The furniture is a little out of date but otherwise its a great place to stay. The hotel is right behind the Burjman shopping center so if you don't feel like hunting for a restaurant you can go to the mall food court.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, great service”
Reviews.Author: sier1972
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff is very friendly and tries to make all efforts for a guest's good stay. Hotel room was pretty clean although I spotted some cockroaches. The good point is that the shopping mall and a supermarket is within a short walk. Also metro station is nearby.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Service”
Reviews.Author: KeniSama
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed in this apartment for four nights. Our stay was originally for three nights but our travel plans changed. The hotel staff was exceptionally flexible and accommodating to our ever changing needs. Everyone on the staff was highly professional and went above and beyond for all our demands. One night we had a party with some friends and the hotel was more than accommodating. The rooms are nice and spacious. We have friends who live in the Bur Dubai area and did research and found that this hotel has the largest rooms for the price. Conveniently located one block from Burjuman Mall, for our needs and what we were doing in Dubai this apartment was centrally located and close to the metro. Free wifi in each apartment, the dishes was adequate, and cookware was fine (don’t expect to be able to cook for a large party). One bedroom has place setting for four people and two bedroom has a place setting for six. Parking is free but very tight and figuring out how to get to the hotel by driving can be difficult at first. Conveniently, there’s a store and pharmacy three blocks away. If you try to get a taxi, you’ll have better luck walking close to the Burjuman. I would recommend a family or a married couple to stay here as the area is very quiet. If you are looking for places close to parties, you are better off looking somewhere else unless you know the city well. I will return.

Reviews.Title: “a real apartment”
Reviews.Author: nr0bert
Reviews.Content: we stayed there for two nights in 2009, but i could imagine staying there for a longer while. ours was a real apartment, with a living room, bedroom and kitchen. it is a bit far from the sights, but it was much cheaper than other hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good price”
Reviews.Author: starmill
Reviews.Content: The hotel is just behind the burjuman center which has a metro station for both red & green line. The room is big and clean, has everything you need, even the microwave and washing mashine, suitable for family. The reception staffs are quite friendly and helpful, but I thought they should have more hands there as they are always very busy for anwsering the questions.

Reviews.Title: “Just Standard”
Reviews.Author: Due-reviewer
Reviews.Content: I'm writing this review from this hotel , it's nice hotel of you are not looking for lux. And just want a place to sleep , the only good thing here is that they give free wireless Internet on the room and signal is good because the point is near the sofa in the ground ! But when I compare with the price of other hotel apartment I find out that they add the price of the Internet to the room charge , any how if you are living for one week you shal go for DU mobile broadband it's will be cheaber , as I say it's standard just like transet hotels but with more space . News paper is provided every morning. Yes one more thing if you want lighter they will not give you one !

Reviews.Title: “love this place!!!!!!!!!! and im missing it already!”
Reviews.Author: dentmishaela
Reviews.Content: my friends and i stayed in this place for 5 days,the place was super cool, locations great, almost near everything, the metro,mall, spinneys, supermarket.Ive stayed in a 4 star hotel before, but staying here makes me feel no difference, the staffs were very helpful esp.the bellboy,Amrar,The towels were replaced everyday, made up our room , newspapers everyday,what more can you ask for?only, downfall is we cant access the wi-fi.all in all, it was nice staying in this hotel.i would recommend it!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “gr8 apt for family”
Reviews.Author: Aspi123 Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: nicely located and high value for money if price is right.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: TobyC35
Reviews.Content: After our previous trip to Dubai we vowed to find a hotel apartment closer to a good mall and to the trainline so we could avoid the heat but not need to take taxis. We were happy with Rose Garden - very quiet and only a carpark separates it from a decent shopping mall and the train line. There is also a reasonable grocery/ corner store nearby for supplies. While the Burjuman Centre doesn't have a supermarket, it does have cafes and a fast food court and is on the trainline to other malls which have very extensive supermarkets, so the apartment kitchen can be used for picnic meals or for more organised cooking. When we had trouble with wifi access the management couldn't have been more helpful. Nice rooftop pool and very friendly staff. Spacious apartments, good clothes washing machines.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious and clean but some small issues”
Reviews.Author: A3aan
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for the weekend because we wanted to unwind in Dubai. We had a good stay at Rose Garden. The location is good, just behind the Burjaman Mall (walking distance, 4 minutes). Free parking in garage. Spacious studio with large and comfortable bed. Every morning there was a newspaper hanging at the door. Supermarket is around the corner. But...there were also some minor issues. There was no hairdryer and only 1 bathrobe in the closet. Safe was not fastened to the wall or cabinet. Hardly any kitchen stuff in kitchenette. Room was not spotless, although clean. It is a little bit worn and torn. (Some lights did not work, curtains a bit greasy, dining table a little sticky). Do not get me wrong, it is a good, decent place to stay but with a little more attention it could be much better.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel but only if you are married...”
Reviews.Author: SigiL
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel through booking.com. Knowing the muslim rules in Dubai, I especially checked on both the hotel and booking.com websites about the possibility of staying there without being married. Nothing was mentioned (for other hotels, it was mentioned), so I booked it. At arrival, at 10PM, we were told that as we were not married, we could not stay there!!! Finally, they ended up giving us a room (after a lot of explanations about the rules in Europe regarding the woman family name and the fact that nobody goes on holiday with the wedding papers), but it was really an unpleasant experience and I never felt at ease whilst staying there. Except from that, it was a good stay. The room was very big, with a small kitchen, which allowed us to have breakfast inside the room before starting the day. The area is really quiet and next to a shopping mall and a subway station, at a walking distance from the old town.

Reviews.Title: “I will never stay at this place again even if it were FREE”
Reviews.Author: merolib
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the rose Garden hotel in dubai at the end of DEC 2009. My advice to you is to avoid this place at any cost. We booked a large room 2 bedrooms and kitchen and 3 bath rooms , the room is not clean and the furniture is very old , there is cockroach's everywhere in the micro weave in refrigerator ..etc , when I call the reception to change the room we move next day to other room but the same case there is a lot of cockroaches in the kitchen especially at night .next day I checkout and escaped from this dirty hotel .Really I will never stay at this place again even if it were FREE

Reviews.Title: “Would recommend these apartments to everyone”
Reviews.Author: DotStHelens
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed off at Dubai for 3 days on our way to my sons wedding in Australia and chose these apartments from the good reviews. The staff were very helpful and friendly, the rooms were clean and tidy and we enjoyed swimming in the roof top swimming pool - where the staff gave us nice fluffy towels to use whilst there. The manager met us on our first morning to ask if everything was alright and if we were enjoying our visit. The Mall was a little too far for me to walk to but we just got a taxi outside the Hotel which dropped us off at the front door to the Mall. We used Taxis for our sightseeing trips, they were all air conditioned and quite cheap to use. We were given a basket of fruit on arrival and again when the electricity went off for a short time one day - even though we weren't in during this time - to compensate for the inconvenience. We stayed again on our way home and everyone remembered us and welcomed us back again. We would definitely recommend these apartment as reasonably priced and comfortable place to stay, especially on a stop over to Australia.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: DjLemsip
Reviews.Content: My wife and I needed somewhere reasonably priced and last minute when we were staying in Dubai for the weekend. Walked in and they offered a reasonable rate. The rooms were a good size and clean, the staff were very polite. If I have to stay in a Dubai hotel again, I'll definately look at this place.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and lovely accomodation”
Reviews.Author: LorrieWA
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights and had a lovely time. The apartment was very clean and well equipped, nicely furnished and very comfortable. Lovely airconditioning. The staff were great. Reasonably priced. It is a fantastic location. 5 minutes in a taxi to the Mall of Emirates. A good Indian and a good Thai/Asian resturant right across the road. Just make sure you have the address if you go anywhere in a taxi as there are so many many hotels in Dubai. I think it would be very hard for the taxi drivers to know them all. The taxi driver from the airport was not sure where it was and so rang the hotel to get directions. I found the taxis safe and they are all metered.

Reviews.Title: “spacious & clean but not exactly 5*”
Reviews.Author: greatexpectationss
Reviews.Content: rooms are excellent size and family friendly despite sharp edged furniture....location is walkable to mall. pool out of service for 1 month, 1 day post arrival, and wifi only operational 50% of time. room service quite good - although we were forgotten on 2 days...

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: GulKakaBaku
Reviews.Content: Good hotel near Burjuman:) Very good service, clean and beautiful appartments.

Reviews.Title: “Run down and overpriced”
Reviews.Author: bangnapaul
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this apartotel for 2 nights. The cooker didnt work the wash/dryer did'nt dry the bath was full of hairs with mould around the edges. The carpet was filthy. The internet was 3US for 1 hours use limited to max download of 20 MB. Run down and overpriced. I would'nt stay there again.

HotelInfo.Name: Rose Garden Hotel Apartments - Bur Dubai
HotelInfo.Address: Behind Burjuman Shopping Mall/Citi Bank | Bur Dubai, Dubai 44401, United Arab Emirates
